1a1(yum): zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin stong phrag ngargya pa bzhugs s+ho/ a
1b1(yum): dang /
2a1(yum): shas+t+ra sa hA sne kA prAd dzA bya ra mi
2a2(yum): / bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
2b1(yum): byin pa stong phrag brgya/ bum bu dang po/ bam
2b2(yum): dang po/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
4a1(yum): / dag pa'i sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang
4a2(yum): rnams pa la rol tu phyin pa'i mchog zong dag stag ste/ gang dag
4a3(yum): mu gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ slob pargyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa dag
4a4(yum): 'o// dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen ma
4b1(yum): la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang
4b2(yum): chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med/ grangs med
4b3(yum): pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis
4b4(yum): rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma mang po'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan
4b5(yum): pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i
7a1(yum): #/ ba kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar/
7a2(yum): bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra bstan
7a3(yum): dod 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par myos po/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs
7a4(yum): pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa/
7a5(yum): rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs
7a6(yum): pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams
7b1(yum): cad la nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'drub par mkhas pa/ sems can lngab sna tsho/
7b2(yum): kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam
7b3(yum): par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa
7b4(yum): sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di lta sde byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chub
7b5(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po
7b6(yum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin chen byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang
7b7(yum): dpon dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bus byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' samra/
8a1(yum): dpa' chen po skyongab sbeng dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu bdag lnga dang
8a2(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang por
8a3(yum): stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bro blo gros dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
8a4(yum): chen po 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros 'dil ba dang / byang chub sems
8a5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod mthong ba dang /
8a6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib med blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu
8a7(yum): thugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po thudam pa'i rnam par gnod pa dang / byang chub ma
8b1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus/
8b2(yum): mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
8b3(yum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gtong brtson pa dang / byu
8b4(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po dang
8b5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dpe med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
8b6(yum): gzigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal mthu chen po thob pa dang / byang chub sem
8b7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs
9a1(yum): rab tu 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
9a2(yum): chen po lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
9a3(yum): chen po snying rje cher sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyan chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnam par
9a4(yum): bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
9a5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang bye ba khrug khrig brgya snang dum dgu dang / thabs gcig tu bcug so// de nas
9a6(yum): de'i tshe/ byabacom ldan grangs nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas/ sgo drang por bsrang ste dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas dkyil mo krung bcas
9a7(yum): bcugs so// der bcugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang rjes su 'brang ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i/
9b1(yum): ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa yang dag par mkhyen nas/ ting rje/
9b2(yum): 'dzin de las brnangs te 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas kyang sku thams cad nas 'od
9b3(yum): rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu
9b4(yum): zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od gzer bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // zhabs long bu gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khriH
9b5(yum): brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // zhabs byin pa gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // zhabs pus mo
9b6(yum): gnyis las kyang 'odi gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya sdong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // zhabs brla gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug
9b7(yum): bcu drug bcu byung ngo // sku sta zur gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor las kyang
11a1(yum): steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khangs gang gA'i klung gi rnye ba snyed dang bachen pos khyab par mdzangad // sems ca ga
11a2(yum): de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la rig par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/ de nas yang ba
11a3(yum): ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od gzer bkye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par
11a4(yum): byas so// shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi
11a5(yum): bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs su
11a6(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
11a7(yum): snang bachen pos khyab par byas so// shang gA'i phyogs pa rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA klung gi bye ba med snang bachen pos khyab par byas so/
11a8(yum): rlung kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bachen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams pa
11b1(yum): klung gi byes me snang bachen pos khyab par byas so// chog gi phyogs sa 'jig rten gyi lams ga lung gi skyes ci nga na sa ga/
11b2(yum): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams kan+d+ha gleng gi khyi ma skyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od de mdzong de dang / 'od des gang la re bar byung
11b3(yum): de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis
11b4(yum): 'od kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi skyes
11b5(yum): snyeng snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub phyog
11b6(yum): su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen po/
11b7(yum): khyab par mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen po'i khyab par mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs
11b8(yum): mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
12a1(yum): snyed snang brjen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen
12a2(yum): de'i khyab par mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten
12a3(yum): gi khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// sems can gang gi 'od de mthong ba dang // 'od des gang la rig par gyur pa de dag thams
12a4(yum): cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong
12a5(yum): gsum gyi stong chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// ljags kyi dbang po de las
12a6(yum): 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs bye ga khrag rgya stong du ma 'thod te// 'od gzeng de dag thams cad la bad+mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba// gsar gyim /
12a7(yum): du snang ba/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ bstan sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa'i jam baM/ ka tsa l-in+diShe/ 1
12a8(yum): rig na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ pad+ma de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin
12b1(yum): smra dang / da/ na sa
12b2(yum): sri / pharol tu phyin pad+ma/ dang ldan pa'i chos brtan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag rdzo rdzogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gan ng+geng gi bram nyid du ga
12b3(yum): shing de dag tu byon nus/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag na phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pa
12b4(yum): ge bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag du byon nas// 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos snyan pa 'di nyid kyi chos bston to// de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig
12b5(yum): rten gyi khams gda'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag du byon nas/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos snyan pa'i 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag
12b6(yum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag du byon nas// 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos stan
12b7(yum): pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag du byon nas// 'di lta ste/ pha rol
12b8(yum): tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu
13a1(yum): byon nas/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
13a2(yum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag 'og gi phyo/
13a3(yum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag
13a4(yum): stang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos sngon
13a5(yum): to/ sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
13a6(yum): gdan ma ge'i khrid la bzugs bzhin du// sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng gi rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par gnag ste/ rdzu 'phrul de mngon par du mdzad do//
13a7(yum): rdzu phrul de mngon par du mdzad pa'i/ spyong gsus kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khanas 'dis rnam ba drug tu gsos te/ gsos so// reb tu g.yos so// na
13a8(yum): gi sa so// 'phral te/ rab tu 'phrul to// kun du mgul to// ldeg ga rab tu sdig go kun tu ldag // chemachem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem/
13b1(yum): rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go// mtha' mthon ni dbus dma'/ dbus mthon ni mtha' dma' ste/ dam
13b2(yum): 'brags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bskyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
13b3(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang /
13b4(yum): log par ltung ba gang ji skad yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// rgyal che/
13b5(yum): bani'i ris kyi lha dang / gsum bcu rtsa gsum dang / tshim dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lnga dang / skal ba mnyam par
13b6(yum): skyes par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang mi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas
13b7(yum): kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba 'thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'dong zhing phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
13b8(yum): bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig lung tsam thang gcig la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /
14a1(yum): byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad / mi 'om pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/
14a2(yum): sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lnga de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba nyid kyis sngon gyi tshi
14a3(yum): rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
14a4(yum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du 'dod zhing byin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
14a5(yum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig sud tsam thang cig la/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
14a6(yum): byem rnyed kyi sems can dmyal bathams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun 'chang / me khom pa thams cad kyi
14a7(yum): nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhor skal bar mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lnga de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang /
14a8(yum): 'de ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde bathob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi ni
14b1(yum): de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du 'dod zhing byin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin
14b2(yum): gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la nub phyogs kyi 'dzi
14b3(yum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye nas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad/
14b4(yum): khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams
14b5(yum): bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rab rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/
14b6(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du 'dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// de bzhin gshegapa
14b7(yum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten
14b8(yum): gi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye nas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad/
15a1(yum): khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag da
15a2(yum): lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par
15a3(yum): byung ba de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang btsugs pa de dag gi drung du do shing na
15a4(yum): nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe
15a5(yum): skad cig yud tsam thang cig la byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye nas
15a6(yum): thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lnga skal
15a7(yum): mnyam par skyes so// de nas med dag dang / de dag dga' ba dang thos pa dang 'bras dang 'di nyid kyis sngon gyi che rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas
15a8(yum): dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde bathong par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
15b1(yum): gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du 'dong shing byin nas nabs la phyag 'phrul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo
15b2(yum): zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i krung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dedus
15b3(yum): bathams cad dang / byol song gyi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad / mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems
15b4(yum): can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa nyams par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs
15b5(yum): zhes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gsheg
15b6(yum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du 'dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
15b7(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi
15b8(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye nas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang
16a1(yum): #/ rgyun 'chang / mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lngar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas
16a2(yum): mi de dag dang lnga de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa
16a3(yum): dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi ning de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa
16a4(yum): de dag gi drung du 'dod zhing byin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud pa
16a5(yum): gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang
16a6(yum): byil song gi skye nas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang
16a7(yum): mr-i dang lhar sel pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lnga de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis snron gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyu
16a8(yum): rjes su dra nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams pade bathob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra batshim pa ma
16b1(yum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing byin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
16b2(yum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
16b3(yum): gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye nas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad
16b4(yum): kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar bskal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lnga de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams
16b5(yum): bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi
16b6(yum): zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin
16b7(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ steng gi
16b8(yum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye nas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad
17a1(yum): rgyun chang / mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas
17a2(yum): mi de dag dang lha de dag dag ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang
17a3(yum): nyams bde 'thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi ning de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bcug pa de
17a4(yum): dag gi drung du dong zhing byin nas zhabs la drug 'tshal to// de bzhin gshegra pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud
17a5(yum): gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din sems can dmus long gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig /
17a6(yum): gdugs myong bar gyur te/ don brnams kyang sna ba'i skabs par gyur to// smon pa rnams kyang dran pa tho par gyur to// sems lpags pa rnams kyang rdzu
17a7(yum): bamed pa'i sems ci bar gyur to// gos med pa rnams kyang rnam ba pa te// dbul po rnams kyang nor byib par gyur to// bkres pa rnams
17a8(yum): ma yong bar gyur to// sa mas kya rung bal par gyur to// nad kyi pa rnams ca nang meng pa gyur to// mus thams pa dang / dang
17b1(yum): ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po chung rgyas par gyur to// ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba
17b2(yum): spangs pa rnams kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'tha' dang / 'tshe ba mi dge basbyangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dber na bdang
17b3(yum): ma dang phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' ba dang / gnyen pa dang / grogs po dang / mtshungs pa'i sems kyis/ sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad
17b4(yum): kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang gtsang ba dang nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur to// de'i
17b5(yum): tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par bzhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams
17b6(yum): cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o// dul ba ni dge ba'o// zhi ba
17b7(yum): ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// bden pa ni dge ba'o// bag byed pa ni dge ba'o// byams pa ni dge ba'o// snying rje ni dge ba'o// srog chags su gyur pa thams
17b8(yum): cad la mi che ba ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pa 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma sgribs pa med pa
18a1(yum): #namakha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa 'am/ zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab da
18a2(yum): bcas pa/ 'khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris su bcas pa/ tshangs
18a3(yum): ba dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs pa ni/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me ldan
18a4(yum): ni lhung nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'di zil gyis mnan de 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis
18a5(yum): mdzes shing lham me ldan ne ljang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang ga
18a6(yum): l+r-i dang pal gyis mangs shing rnamam ldan na snang zhugs so// de bzhin du phyogs kyi jig rten gyi sa gang+gA klung gyi byes snyed kyil rgyas chen te/
18a7(yum): su mdog / dang ga'i brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham ma ldan ne lhung nge btsugs so// de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA gleng gi rjem skad zimakyi
18a8(yum): nan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi l+r-ing dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me ldan ne ljang nger btsugs so// de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
18b1(yum): gang+gAng klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me ldan ne lhang der bzhugs so// de bzhin du byu
18b2(yum): gyis phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi khyim snad zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me ldan no
18b3(yum): der bzhugs so// de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal
18b4(yum): gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang der bzhugs so// de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od
18b5(yum): dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me ldan ni lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
18b6(yum): bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me lhon ni lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du 'og gi b+h+yony+dza
18b7(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham mi ldan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du
18b8(yum): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne ljang nger bzhugs//
19a1(yum): 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri nAg po gzhan zil gyis gnon par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me ldan ni ldang ngo //
19a2(yum): 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cang zil gyis gnon par gnas pa mdzes shing ldum me ldan no'o// 'di lta ste dper na
19a3(yum): ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis gnon par gnon par gnas pa ni mdzes shing ldam me ldan ni lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das
19a4(yum): bcom phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis gnon par bcus
19a5(yum): pa yang 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me ldan ne ljang nge'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i
19a6(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'drir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to// de bzhin de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten
19a7(yum): gyi khams 'di gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang deng ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang
19a8(yum): tshem dang / gsum bcu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
19b1(yum): ba'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la/ nyams bde ba dang / yid bde bskyes nas
19b2(yum): lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bring ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas bye ma dang / wA dz+nyAs kyi byug spos dang /
19b3(yum): kyi ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang ku mu ta dang / pun+da ri ka dang / na lin+d+ra dang / so'u gan+d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ge sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na brtsa
19b4(yum): dang / lha rdzas kyi rkyen dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na 'dir
19b5(yum): dong ste/ byin nas me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / byug spos dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun+da ri ka dang
19b6(yum): na lin dang / so ru gan+d+hi dang / me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyun dang / gdugs dang / rgyul mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gis
19b7(yum): bcom ldan 'das la gtor ro// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang snod du gyur
19b8(yum): pa'i mi ji skad cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin cing bcom
20a1(yum): ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// me dog dang / 'breng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma la sogs pa dang / nabapa' dang /
20a2(yum): rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan de dag thams cad kyang / de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
20a3(yum): dbu'i steng gi na mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gnas par gyur to// khang pa brgyag pa
20a4(yum): de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / drar gyi lnga ldi mang po 'byang bar gyur to// mngon par 'byung bar gyur to// rab tu 'byung bar gyur to// me tog dang dar rmi lnga
20a5(yum): de dag gis stong gsum gyi snod chen de'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di snang ba de gsar gyi ma dog lta du sa
20a6(yum): shin du mdzes shing ldum me ldan ni ljang nger gyur to// stong gsum gyi sdeng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lnga ba bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
20a7(yum): gling gi sa nyid kyang bam ldan 'das kyi 'od srung bdas khya gsal bar zur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi rnams pang+gA gling gi brim byed kyang
20a8(yum): ldan 'das kyi 'ad snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pan+de'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des
20b1(yum): khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab par gyur to//
20b2(yum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// shar
20b3(yum): lce'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho nub kyi
20b4(yum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtsham
20b5(yum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams
20b6(yum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
20b7(yum): skyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gas bya bar gyur to// de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas mchog
20b8(yum): mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'dzam bu'i
21a1(yum): gling gi mi rnams ji ldang sems pade bzhin du/ nub bzlang spyod kyi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku balnga ba'i mchog mi shes pa ma
21a2(yum): nus 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun du btsugs shing chos ston dosnyam mo// shAr gyi lus 'dags po'i mi rnams kyi
21a3(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgru ba lnga pa'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston
21a4(yum): snyam mo// byang sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ba/
21a5(yum): cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// rgyal chen po zhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du
21a6(yum): sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// gsum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lnga rnams kyis de bzhin gsheg pa'i ska
21a7(yum): ba'i mnag mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bcugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// mtshama'i
21a8(yum): rnams kyid bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mitshig migs pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bdin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bcus
21b1(yum): shing chos ston to snyam mo// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhi/
21b2(yum): gsheg pa bdag cag gi mdun na btsugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'drim
21b3(yum): du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
21b4(yum): blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs ris kyi lha
21b5(yum): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing
21b6(yum): chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs lha nyi pan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin
21b7(yum): gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa
21b8(yum): mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na btsugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis
22a1(yum): #/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku balnga ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag
22a2(yum): gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shis pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems pa
22a3(yum): gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// chung snang gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi
22a4(yum): shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnam
22a5(yum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bcugs
22a6(yum): shing chos ston to snyam mo// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga ba'i mtshig mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
22a7(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na btsugs shing chos sbyin to snyam mo// dge pa'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta ba'i mchog migs pa
22a8(yum): nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// chung dge'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin
22b1(yum): gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston
22b2(yum): to snyam mo// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gsheg
22b3(yum): pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di
22b4(yum): snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
22b5(yum): blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
22b6(yum): chung che'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdunan
22b7(yum): bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs bI sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur
22b8(yum): to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi
23a1(yum): shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
23a2(yum): mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na
23a3(yum): bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur
23a4(yum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi
23a5(yum): shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
23a6(yum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos
23a7(yum): sngon te snyam mo// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
23a8(yum): bdag cag gi mdun na btsugs shing chos ston tesam mo// de bzhin du snying gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / snga thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs
23b1(yum): su lA bas mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
23b2(yum): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du
23b3(yum): sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs chos ston to snyam mo// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad
23b4(yum): dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi
23b5(yum): 'dun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu kye ba mdzad de/ yang 'ong
23b6(yum): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzag rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang ba
23b7(yum): gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur te/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang
23b8(yum): rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
24a1(yum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar lde'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi byem
24a2(yum): snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// lce nub kyi phyog sna mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs
24a3(yum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyid kyang rab tu sna
24a4(yum): bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi snying chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
24a5(yum): 'di ni sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa~Mba~M de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
24a6(yum): padage slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzugs bla mngon par gyur to// gang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pa
24a7(yum): rlung gi khyim mang po dgan sems can 'aspyod dang khrod ba de dag gis kyang srong bsum kyi snying chen pa'i 'di rjod gi 'ams 'din/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
24a8(yum): gags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang mya kyi grub pa deg phreng shi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang sa
24b1(yum): tu bcugs pa mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can ganga'aji snyed khong pa de dag gis kyang /
24b2(yum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thung ba dan
24b3(yum): slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams
24b4(yum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can ji snyed khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan
24b5(yum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
24b6(yum): 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang
24b7(yum): ji snyed khod pa de dag gis kyang // stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'dzes de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
24b8(yum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur
25a1(yum): to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa da
25a2(yum): gis kyang / sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
25a3(yum): shA thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs
25a4(yum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen
25a5(yum): khams 'drin/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dbye
25a6(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyis 'jig
25a7(yum): snying po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang snying gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
25a8(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun du
25b1(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// nub byang gA bya
25b2(yum): skyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
25b3(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas
25b4(yum): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyid po de dag na sems na/
25b5(yum): de dag kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
25b6(yum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar
25b7(yum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen
25b8(yum): rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun da
26a1(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gci tu zhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas par phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi
26a2(yum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
26a3(yum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung nas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
26a4(yum): byin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung
26a5(yum): zhes bya ba 'dug du'i/ snang ba chen po dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skye blta ba'i mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
26a6(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung nus gan ba der sing sde byin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra pa
26a7(yum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs nas rin nan 'byung nas pa 'di da ces nas d+mo// com ldan 'das 'di chen po 'di lta bu 'ag rten du byung ba dang /
26a8(yum): 'di mar cher gamos pa dang de badzin gshegs de'i bu 'dis bu gang napa' po'i rgyu phyin/ de nad ces rgamal pa dang / bcom ldan 'dis de
26b1(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas
26b2(yum): 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rje
26b3(yum): gyi khams mi 'jed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyu thub pa zhes pa bzhugs shing
26b4(yum): skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o de nas byang chub
26b5(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas byung ba'i/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
26b6(yum): rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'dzad der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
26b7(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing snyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpal
26b8(yum): sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang ngal cher gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gzugs dang so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin da
27a1(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams pa du dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta pa'i slang du 'tsho'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
27a2(yum): 'byung nas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar dro'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
27a3(yum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun gnas 'byung ba
27a4(yum): la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
27a5(yum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cing / rigs kyi bu sang+yas kyi ning der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig
27a6(yum): rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dang
27a7(yum): sems dpa' chen po 'od gzir kun gnas byung ba'i/ de bzhin bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
27a8(yum): rin can srung banas da las 'dreg sar gi midag na 'dab mthong dang ldan pa de dag rdzas te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab byung ba dang/
27b1(yum): khri'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
27b2(yum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
27b3(yum): phye ma dang / na 'aza' dang / brgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dun dag gi rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur btir bya ba dang / phung dung bya ba
27b4(yum): dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thu chen po'i/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
27b5(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba dar dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
27b6(yum): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di gzer kun gnas 'byung bas bcom ldan 'das la
27b7(yum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas bcom ldan
27b8(yum): 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ bo 'dog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang bgyes par spyod dam zhes dri ste/
28a1(yum): pad+ma gser gyi 'dog can lom stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
28a2(yum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin rten 'byung nas kyis bcom ldan 'das le mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
28a3(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin
28a4(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gan ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas
28a5(yum): byar khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la brtsams te chos ston to//
28a6(yum): chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub
28a7(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye dang / bu mo gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / ring rang gi dge ba'i
28a8(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga kyi thub pa la rim 'gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// thad
28b1(yum): dud du byas so// mchod par byas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum bu dang po// bam po gnyis pa/ de nas lho phyogs logs
28b2(yum): su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
28b3(yum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
28b4(yum): rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
28b5(yum): mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pa'i snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan mchog mi shes pa mthong nas/
28b6(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
28b7(yum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di
28b8(yum): chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar ches g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad
29a1(yum): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i
29a2(yum): dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang phyogs legs su 'jig rten
29a3(yum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
29a4(yum): nga'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
29a5(yum): ston to// 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
29a6(yum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
29a7(yum): mi mjed deng / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bkye ni
29a8(yum): bsnyen dbyung ba dang / byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang ngal cher gnonur byung ba/ gdungs dang sa so yang dag par rig pa sgru
29b1(yum): ba rab tu thob bo// ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
29b2(yum): ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig de bzhin gshegs
29b3(yum): bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la/ badz+ra
29b4(yum): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dra/
29b5(yum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rishAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dgra yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir
29b6(yum): zhen/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i skyes pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ro//
29b7(yum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
29b8(yum): rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba/
30a1(yum): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas
30a2(yum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang /
30a3(yum): byug pa dang / b+he mra dang / na bze dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdun dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bud
30a4(yum): du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
30a5(yum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal de phyogs
30a6(yum): gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs cig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa'i bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
30a7(yum): ldan 'das depazhin gshegs pa dgra 'arnam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myu na med pa'i dadal bcom ldan 'das la srung mi mang la ma/
30a8(yum): nod pa ma mchis sam/ po mdog pada'am/ chu thams dang ldan nam/ bde dang dgos par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ badz+ra gsir gyi mdog can lom
30b1(yum): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das
30b2(yum): la mchod pa'i slad du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes
30b3(yum): nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang
30b4(yum): na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis de'i jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
30b5(yum): mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la brtsams te/ chos ston to// chos ston pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag
30b6(yum): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang
30b7(yum): khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
30b8(yum): rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim 'gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas nub phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi kham
30b9(yum): gang+gA'i klung gi snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar ni ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
30b10(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing / mtsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
30b11(yum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod bI
30b12(yum): blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs bI sku lta na mchog mi shes pa de mthong nas/
30b13(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na be der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
30b14(yum): de bzhin shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di
30b15(yum): la sa rten du 'byung ba dang / dgas 'di ltar rjer gsos pa dang / de bzhin gshesas pa'i sku 'di bru gdung ba 'di na/
30b16(yum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoms yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rin chen 'od 'gro'o// byang chub sems dpa'
30b17(yum): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das
30b18(yum): la mchod pa'i slad du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag ba nas
30b19(yum): nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snying po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag ga
30b20(yum): na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'ijig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
30b21(yum): mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la brtsams te/ chos ston to// chos stan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag
30b22(yum): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang
30b23(yum): khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
30b24(yum): rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim 'gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
31a1(yum): gang+gA'i klung gi snyed 'das ba kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar ni bzhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
31a2(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing / mtsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
31a3(yum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod
31a4(yum): blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa ldan mchog mi shes pa de mthong nas
31a5(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'bro gang na ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
31a6(yum): de bzhin ste/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'bri de la 'di skad ces gso to// ma ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di
31a7(yum): khru'adig rten du 'byung ba dang / dgas 'di ltar rjer g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bra gdu ba 'di ba'i rgyu bo sbyin/ ded pas
31a8(yum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rin chen 'odadi 'gro'o// byang chub sems dpa
31b1(yum): sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal gyi sa kyi bu 'di ni shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
31b2(yum): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas
31b3(yum): thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de ni de'i mthu yin
31b4(yum): ti de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
31b5(yum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de
31b6(yum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing snyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
31b7(yum): sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gno nur gyur pa dang / gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms
31b8(yum): par 'jug pa thams cad dbang rab tu thob pa de dag lta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/
32a1(yum): rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
32a2(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'bros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la pad+mo rin po che sa
32a3(yum): tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
32a4(yum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten
32a5(yum): gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa
32a6(yum): sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro
32a7(yum): de lngas/ pad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang du
32a8(yum): no gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du me dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ning de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
32b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
32b2(yum): ma dang ni bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du byang
32b3(yum): dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
32b4(yum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos byan
32b5(yum): 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// phyogs cig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das
32b6(yum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro bcom ldan
32b7(yum): 'das la skung mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo 'dog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri
32b8(yum): ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can lo ma sdong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

32b11(yum): gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gamangar gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tham
32b12(yum): cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la brtsams te chos

32b14(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khyi'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas
32b15(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub la gror byas so// byer byas so// du
32b16(yum): dus so// mchod pa byas so// drinas byang phyogs phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams kati dring gi nga srid 'das bdun gyi gyir len/ 'dzin
32b17(yum): bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / thos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / drug pa dang /
32b18(yum): ma dang ne baba' dang / rkyen dang / gdugs dong / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / dudud du bya
32b19(yum): dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
32b20(yum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag
32b21(yum): 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// phyogs cig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das
32b22(yum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro bcom ldan
32b23(yum): 'das la skung mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo 'dog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'di
32b24(yum): ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can lo ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
