33a3(yum): gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag ga na der gdor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tham
33a4(yum): cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la brtsams te chos
33a5(yum): ston to// chos sbyin pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chu
33a6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khyi'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa
33a7(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyu thub pan/ 'gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// bad
33a8(yum): dbyas so// mchod pa byas so// dri nas byang phyogs tshogs su 'jig rten gyi khams padi'i gling ni srid 'das bkun gyi phyi rolen/ 'jig ni
33b1(yum): gyi khams da rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes zla ba bzugs shi
33b2(yum): sbyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rnyog par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten
33b3(yum): khoms gdud ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i byin zhes bya ba 'dug pas 'dug pas n+ya'i chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang /
33b4(yum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ldan mchog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyas
33b5(yum): ba'i dbang po blang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po
33b6(yum): de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshes
33b7(yum): nga'i sku 'di lta bu gang ba 'di ci'i rgyu ni'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
33b8(yum): pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
34a1(yum): 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/
34a2(yum): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa'
34a3(yum): sems dpa' dzin po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
34a4(yum): chen po rgyal ba'i byin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to//
34a5(yum): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
34a6(yum): thub pa de lnga bdang / de la phyag bgyi zhing snyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur
34a7(yum): bgazungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thong ba/ ti nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dbang rab du rdzob pa de dag
34a8(yum): du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pargyal ba'i dbang po'i bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi byedade ltar de'i dus la bab pa gas na/ 'jig rten
34b1(yum): kyi 'ams mi mdzad der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems
34b2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtul ba'i byin pa/ pad+mo ron po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi madrog can spyod gyur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan
34b3(yum): da ga gags pa da com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas n+de khru'i pa de la bcu 'di dag gis ga // rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
34b4(yum): der zag yod par spyod cig/ de ni'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams deng skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dang/
34b5(yum): ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba byin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
34b6(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sem
34b7(yum): dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas
34b8(yum): mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang /
35a1(yum): 'breng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgya
35a2(yum): mtshan dang / ba dan dag gi rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems
35a3(yum): da'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
35a4(yum): nga'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
35a5(yum): 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
35a6(yum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das la
35a7(yum): srung mi mnga'a'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'di ltas
35a8(yum): pod+mo gser gyi mdog can lam stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
35b1(yum): sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
35b2(yum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin
35b3(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams deng
35b4(yum): thams cad rgyas par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la brtsams te/
35b5(yum): chos ston to// chos ston pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur
35b6(yum): to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang
35b7(yum): gi dge ba'i brtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim 'gror byas so//
35b8(yum): bkur stir byas so// bu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snye
36a1(yum): po 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyan pa zhes bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
36a2(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
36a3(yum): po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
36a4(yum): rnam par rgyal ba'i rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pa'i/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta pa mchog
36a5(yum): mi shes pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na
36a6(yum): bder song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs nus ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dbang de
36a7(yum): 'di ma kyiso gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta du 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher gsos pa dang / de ban gshegs pa
36a8(yum): sku 'di la bu gang ba 'dici'i rgyu'i byin/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'is
36b1(yum): rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces paka' stsal
36b2(yum): to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni ljonub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya
36b3(yum): bsod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ngo // de byang chub sems
36b4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ de ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
36b5(yum): rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po
36b6(yum): dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
36b7(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing snyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
36b8(yum): de dag byung ba la char gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams ca
37a1(yum): la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag lta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis
37a2(yum): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa sa
37a3(yum): drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la bad+mo
37a4(yum): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
37a5(yum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkyathu ba pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der brag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi
37a6(yum): khams da skyis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba dka ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa
37a7(yum): dang na po rnam par dU ba'i rnam par gtsun pas/ ma ldan 'das ba'idi gaganas pa dgra 'am pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang nas ting nge
37a8(yum): nga pa dru pa kyi da ma dza dzin pa dganas te/ bya sems gyis pa dang /
37b1(yum): khye'u dang / bu ma'i gzugs su 'dug pa byed khrag khrig brgya snod du ma dang 'phrogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byung bar tu rna
37b2(yum): 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang /
37b3(yum): drug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyun dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdun dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur zhir bya ba dang / bud
37b4(yum): dri bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po'i/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
37b5(yum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der drong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
37b6(yum): phyogs cig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das
37b7(yum): lo 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam par
37b8(yum): dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la sbyang mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dpa
38a1(yum): zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can lo ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
38a2(yum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom
38a3(yum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i// pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtsha
38a4(yum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang nA ba der gtor
38a5(yum): to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyang rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku meng bzhun
38a6(yum): shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la rtsams te chos ston/ chos snyan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /
38a7(yum): na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang /
38a8(yum): dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dgo gis kyang / rang rang gi dge pa'i rtsi bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dgra bcom po yang dag par
38b1(yum): sus rgyas thu phu la ri 'gror byas sa// bad+mar stir byas so// pra dud du byas so// mchod par byas so// de nas ga 'i phyogs rnams kyi
38b2(yum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i gling gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyun shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bdi
38b3(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs 'tshe skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

38b8(yum): lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad gsol
39a1(yum): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems

39b6(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal dri las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab stong dang ldan

40a5(yum): sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos bcom ldan 'das la 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

40a7(yum): spyod dam zhes 'dzi ste/ bad+mogs kyi mdog nu la ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gagags pa da bachem pa yang dag par rdzogs
40a8(yum): sangs rgyas 'drings pa'i dpa gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bsrung ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra tsam pa

40b7(yum): de nas lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dadras pa kun gi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes
40b8(yum): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing

41a7(yum): 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
41a8(yum): sas kyis kyil la 'i ldang bdas pa'i dpam kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pokyi ma rab tu snang bdel 'dig
41b1(yum): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma med 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
41b2(yum): mi mjed ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sanges rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba zhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /
41b3(yum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stan te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sem
41b4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i
41b5(yum): dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das
41b6(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing snyen bkur ba dang / byang chub
41b7(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang ngal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa ting nge
41b8(yum): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ de dag lta ba'i slad du 'chi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i
42a1(yum): dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyi bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song gi/
42a2(yum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
42a3(yum): chen po nya ma rab tu snang ba la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
42a4(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i
42a5(yum): phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur te/ de nas
42a6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba'i/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma
42a7(yum): dkyil 'khor snang ba rnam pa'i dpal de las bad+mogs ri gyi mdog can 'dab me stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rang du phyung
42a8(yum): bdang khyed dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byeb khrag khrig tu stong dum dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ ljon kyi phyis
42b1(yum): 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba
42b2(yum): byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bdera' dang / rgyun dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phud
42b3(yum): dri bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos// bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin ga
42b4(yum): bu dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te//
42b5(yum): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi me rab tu snang ba'i bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
42b6(yum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'ad
42b7(yum): la snang mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo 'dog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo ga sa
42b8(yum): gi mdog can lo ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
43a1(yum): snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang
43a2(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+ma de dag bzhes nas/ lho ba nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byes
43a3(yum): skyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten
43a4(yum): gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing // 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
43a5(yum): 'di la brtsams te chos ston to// chos ldan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
43a6(yum): tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis
43a7(yum): klung rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsu bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ying dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim 'gror byas
43a8(yum): so// bkur stir byas so// bu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byen
43b1(yum): snying 'das btsun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
43b2(yum): pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
43b3(yum): pa 'di nyid yang dge par ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces
43b4(yum): ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sku lta na mchog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan
43b5(yum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa ga na pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
43b6(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa de la 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar
43b7(yum): cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
43b8(yum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces ba
43'a1(yum): stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'phye
43'a2(yum): rten gyi khams mi mjed byas pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi kyi thub po bzhugs shing 'tsho spyong //
43'a3(yum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston te/ de ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sem
43'a4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa
43'a5(yum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
43'a6(yum): bayang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stekyi thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bskur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
43'a7(yum): de dag kun kyang pal cher gnon nur gyur pa/ gzungs deng so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
43'a8(yum): pad la dang rab tu thob pa/ de dag lta ba'i slad du 'chir// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa gdugs dam pa'i bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de
43'b1(yum): da dus la bab pa gas na/ 'dig rten gyi 'ams mi mad der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rnam
43'b2(yum): dam nga/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong srung te/ ga
43'b3(yum): bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs
43'b4(yum): rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka
43'b5(yum): ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang
43'b6(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las/ pad+mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems
43'b7(yum): dpa'i khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi
43'b8(yum): snang bar gyur nas/ nub bying gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang /
44a1(yum): spos dang / gdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
44a2(yum): bdan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub
44a3(yum): sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba dar dong ste
44a4(yum): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dang
44a5(yum): sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
44a6(yum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas bcom ldan 'das la snang mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/
44a7(yum): bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo ga ser gyi mdog can lo ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
44a8(yum): yang ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das la mchong ba'i srad du 'askur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsas
44b1(yum): ma pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zlababs parjod dan pas nas/ rlung byang sa phyogs sa kyi mas rten gyi la ga smra
44b2(yum): ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs bla'i de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jog rten
44b3(yum): khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'ang
44b4(yum): nyid la brtsams te chos ston to// chos stan de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
44b5(yum): chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de
44b6(yum): dag gis kyang rang rang gis dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
44b7(yum): la rim 'gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byem
44b8(yum): snyid po kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
45a1(yum): rgyas pad+mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha ro/
45a2(yum): phyin pa 'di nyi yang dag par ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa zhes byas
45a3(yum): 'dug 'dug pa'i// snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pade dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ldan mchog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan
45a4(yum): 'dres de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs nas pad+mo'i dpal gang na pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
45a5(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpa lA la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'chi
45a6(yum): rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gsheg pa'i sku 'di lta bu bda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / btsam
45a7(yum): ldan 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dngal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjos pa
45a8(yum): 'di gad ces paka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni phreng gi phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomapa
45b1(yum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gakyu thub pa zhes b+hab bzhugs shing 'tsho sbyong ngo // de byang chub sems dang rgyas rgyas dpa chen po rnams pa shes
45b2(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo ngam pas/ bcom ldan 'das
45b3(yum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi/
45b4(yum): khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi/
45b5(yum): zhing snyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang ngal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig
45b6(yum): pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag lta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das
45b7(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar dri'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/
45b8(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa
46a1(yum): la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
46a2(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ba rgya thub pa de la pad+ma 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi ning deng bag yod par spyod cig/ detsa
46a3(yum): phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur
46a4(yum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dam pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i
46a5(yum): dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo ga rtsa
46a6(yum): su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stospyod du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
46a7(yum): gang ji skad cig bcugs shing 'tsho snying po de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug smos dang / 'greng ba dang / byug pa dang / byom dang / na 'du'ad
46a8(yum): rgyan dang / gdus dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bden dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkrar stir bya ba dang / budud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub se
46b1(yum): dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
46b2(yum): rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu
46b3(yum): 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
46b4(yum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dngul bcom ldan 'das la sbyang mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/
46b5(yum): sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dram zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gasder gyi mdo ga can lo ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
46b6(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan
46b7(yum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i shA sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
46b8(yum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo
47a1(yum): dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bcugs kyi
47a2(yum): 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid la rnams te chos ston to// chos snyan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
47a3(yum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa
47a4(yum): de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim 'gror byas so//
47a5(yum): dkur stir byas so// bu dud du sa so// mchod pa byas so// de nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das bkun gyi pha rol na/
47a6(yum): 'jig rten gyi sa mad sa dge' bzhis byang yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa rje rtsom pa snang dag par rdzogs dri'i sangs rgyas dpa' ba'i dpa la zhes bya
47a7(yum): bzugs pad 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid sang dag pang ston par mdza do//
47a8(yum): ris dzi rten gyi sa dang / bye chu ma dpa' sems dpa chen po dag ngas kyang nas rgyang 'dzi 'gapas/ yin pa dang
47b1(yum): pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga na mchog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
47b2(yum): rgyas dga' bas dpal gang na ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal
47b3(yum): de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
47b4(yum): 'di lta bu gda' ba ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da
47b5(yum): ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba'i byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
47b6(yum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
47b7(yum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di
47b8(yum): ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
48a1(yum): #dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' bas dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/
48a2(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing snyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems
48a3(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par
48a4(yum): 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag lta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag
48a5(yum): ba'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
48a6(yum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba'i byin pa la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/
48a7(yum): gser gi mdog can snod srung te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshems pa dgra bcom pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gakyi thub pa de la bd-i nga
48a8(yum): gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bge yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir ne na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
48b1(yum): chen po de dag ni mgu bar dkar ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de
48b2(yum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/
48b3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas
48b4(yum): mi snang bar gyur nas steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang
48b5(yum): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang /
48b6(yum): phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po'o/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
48b7(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba dar dong sde phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
48b8(yum): 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
49a1(yum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snang mi mnga' 'am/
49a2(yum): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can lo ma stong dang
49a3(yum): ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' bas dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la
49a4(yum): mchod pa'i slad du sbyar ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i pad+mo de dge ba zhes nas/
49a5(yum): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang
49a6(yum): na ba derang gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mod de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ma
49a7(yum): 'dugs cing / 'di ltar ba la tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid sa rnams te/ chos ston to// chos ldan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams ca
49a8(yum): ma ldan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byeng chub tu ris par gyur to// phyi chub sems dpa' sengs da chen po khyis pa dang / rig byung ba dang /
49b1(yum): khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
49b2(yum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim 'gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang tsa
49b3(yum): la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur te/ me tog sril ma sna tshogs kyi kun du gang ba dang /
49b4(yum): dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po kun nas bres pa dang / snod sna tshogs nas ba dug spos sna tshogs thul ba dang / dpag bsam gyi shing rgyan dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs
49b5(yum): kyis yal ge'i rtse mor yur za ba/ me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dang / 'phreng ba'i shing dang / phye ma'i shing dang / bdug spos
49b6(yum): kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu rgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
49b7(yum): rgyas me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa dang / byang chub
49b8(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang / gzi brjid chen po dag 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo can bzhin du gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
50a1(yum): byin pa stong phrag brgya pa las// gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// dum bu dang po/ bam po gsum pa// // de'i tshe de ltar
50a2(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang mi dang
50a3(yum): lha ma yin dang bcas pa mang po'i tshogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa mang po de dag 'dus par thug su chud nas/
50a4(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches thams cad rnam
50a5(yum): pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus ba
50a6(yum): ldan 'das la 'di nad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dnga' chen po ches thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs
50a7(yum): 'chung rgyu bar 'tshal bas/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pag
50a8(yum): ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra da ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas pa med pa'i tshul du/ shes rab kyi pha rolatu
50b1(yum): phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / yongs su len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir yongs su btung ba med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs
50b2(yum): rdzogs par bya'o// ltung ba dang mi ltung bar bya ba med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir bzod pa'i
50b3(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa
50b4(yum): bya'o// 'khrug pa med cing yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya'o// chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir
50b5(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
50b6(yum): dran pa nye bar gzhag po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
50b7(yum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ yang dag par spong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra
50b8(yum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
51a1(yum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/
51a2(yum): te/ dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
51a3(yum): du phyin pa la gnas te/ stongs mi dmigs pa'i phyir stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos she
51a4(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ byang chub kyi yan lag mi dmigs pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bya
51a5(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lam mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu
51a6(yum): rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir sting
51a7(yum): banyid kyi dang nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byaro// shaR+sha dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
51a8(yum): mtshan ma med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po//
51b1(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ ston pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ ljod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byeng // gad+ha
51b2(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan pa ni yongs su rjes
51b3(yum): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ tshad med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chang re
51b4(yum): pa pa ni yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ gzugs med pa'i
51b5(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/

51b7(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mthar gyis gnas pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
51b8(yum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir mngon par
52a1(yum): shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te
52a2(yum): 'du shes dgu sgom par bya ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
52a3(yum): sems dpa'i chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'bru can mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'bru can gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i du byang chub sa/
52a4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rnags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//
52a5(yum): shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par dmar ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par dmar pa'i

52a8(yum): rnam por thos pa mi dmigs pas phyir/ rnam par thos pa'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// shar dwa ti'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs rab kyi pa ro//
52b1(yum): byin pa la gnas te/ rnam par thor ba mi dmigs pa'i b+hi/ rnam par thor ba'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// shur da 'i'i byabyang chub sems dpa' sems
52b2(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rus pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rus pa'i 'du shes sdom par bya'o// shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems

52b4(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi mthun pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o//
52b5(yum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
52b6(yum): sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos rjes
52b7(yum): su dran pa sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dge 'dun mi dmigs pa'i
52b8(yum): phyir/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ tshul khrims
53a1(yum): mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
53a2(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ gtong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sem
53a3(yum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyid pa la gnas te/ lha mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ lha rjes su dran pa sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
53a4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa
53a5(yum): sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ skye ba mi dmigs pa'iphyir
53a6(yum): skye ba rjes su dran pa sgom par bya'o// sha ra da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
53a7(yum): mi migs pa'i phyir/ 'tsho ba rjes su dran pa sgom par bya'o// shar dwa nga'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ro du byed
53a8(yum): laganas te/ lus mi dmigs par gyur/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par du'o// sher dwa ti bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa dzin nas
53b1(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi rtag pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mi rtaka pa'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa
53b2(yum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes sdom par bya'o//
53b3(yum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnas te/ bdag myi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bdag gi 'du sa
53b4(yum): sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi sdug pa mi dam/ gas
53b5(yum): pa'i phyir/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnas te/
53b6(yum): 'chi ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'chi ba'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
53b7(yum): phyin pa la gnas te/ dga' bar bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten thams cad la dga' bar bya ba'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bya
53b8(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ yid brtan du mi rung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yid brtan du mi rung
54a1(yum): #/ ba'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
54a2(yum): sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// sha rA ti'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
54a3(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ kun 'byung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa sgom par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
54a4(yum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'gog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'gog pa zhes pa sgom par du'o// shar dwa ti'i bya byang chub sa
54a5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lam mi dmigs pa'i phyir lam shes pa sgom par byar// shar dwa ti'i bu bying chu
54a6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ zadra pa ming migs pa'i phyir zang pashes pa ston par bya'o// radA hU~MH
54a7(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mi ste ba gos pa sgom par bye//
54a8(yum): shar dwa ti'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ chos mi dmigs par byeng / chos shes pa sgom par bya'o//
54b1(yum): shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ gnyis su med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa
54b2(yum): shes pa sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ kun rdzob mi dmigs pa'i
54b3(yum): phyir kun rdzob shes po sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'dris pa mi
54b4(yum): dmigs pa'i phyir 'dris pa shes sgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
54b5(yum): sgra ci bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir sgra ci bzhin shes pa sgom par bya'o// shA rA dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
54b6(yum): phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa dang bcas/ rnam par spyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge
54b7(yum): 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog
54b8(yum): pA cing rnam par spyod pa tsam mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par spyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa
55a1(yum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par spyod du
55a2(yum): mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par spyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sa
55a3(yum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir yongs su ma shes pa songs
55a4(yum): su shes par bya ba'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
55a5(yum): kun shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir kun shes pa'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
55a6(yum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ kun shes pa rig pa'i dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ kun shes pa rig pa'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byung
55a7(yum): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bra la gnas te/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ zil gyim gnon rje'i
55a8(yum): su mched yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ chub pa'i skye man
55b1(yum): mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chub pa'i skye mched yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
55b2(yum): pa la gnas te/ dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sdu ba'i dngos po bani yongs su rdzogs par byar// shA ra dwa de'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa dzin rje
55b3(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par dgod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par dgod pa ba'i yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shar dwa ti'i du drang chub
55b4(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sa mi dmigs pa'i phyir sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gar dwa ti'i bu zung
55b5(yum): chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir spyod pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
55b6(yum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bzod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bzod pa bcu yongs su rdzog
55b7(yum): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
55b8(yum): lhag pa'i bsam pa nyi shu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas to//
56a1(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
56a2(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bzhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bzhi gnas dang /
56a3(yum): lhag mthong shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rim
56a4(yum): pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir rig pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
56a5(yum): de so so yang dag par rig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
56a6(yum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ mi 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pa ba ni yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// ra
56a7(yum): da'i dbyang chub sems dpa sems dang chen pos gsu rab tu rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mnyams pa mi migs pa'i phyir/ marnams pam
56a8(yum): par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems sa dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
56b1(yum): pa da byed pa da rigs par byer/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bubyang chub sems dpa' sems dnga' chen pos zhes
56b2(yum): rab kyi bo rom tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nor mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ nor rgyu bdun yongasardzogs par byaro// shurA dwa ti'i bri byang chub sems dpa' sems
56b3(yum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs
56b4(yum): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir sems can
56b5(yum): gyi gnas dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ de bzhin gzhas
56b6(yum): pa'i stobs mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dri bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
56b7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa
56b8(yum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir byams pa chen po
57a1(yum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
57a2(yum): chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
57a3(yum): pa la gnas te/ dga' ba chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dga' ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
57a4(yum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ btang snyoms chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ btang snyoms chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// thams cad mkhyen
57a5(yum): pa'i ye shes rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
57a6(yum): brtson par bya'o// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
57a7(yum): la brtson par bya'o// thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
57a8(yum): brtson par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang zhes pas rnam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
57b1(yum): gas la tu sbyin pal badzin par gyu@mam gyu ba mas pamams par 'ang / byung
57b2(yum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
57b3(yum): bal bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i skyon meng bar 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi bar ma
57b4(yum): phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
57b5(yum): bar bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
57b6(yum): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// mngon par shes pa drug
57b7(yum): la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod
57b8(yum): pa rnam par g.yo ba shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sa sa
58a1(yum): rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa la
58a2(yum): bslab par bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsla
58a3(yum): par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa gtong ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yid rang ba dang
58a4(yum): ldan pas sems skyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
58a5(yum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang bu mo tshul khrims bsrung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sem
58a6(yum): skyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang
58a7(yum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mi bzod pa bsgom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems skyed
58a8(yum): macig gis ril gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab zer bya'o// nyan thos dang dngas so
58b1(yum): pa pa gas kyi dang gas kyi rnam rtson 'grus rlom pa rnams cad ky-i dge pa ba dang / thams cad rjes su 'du ba dang ldan pa sa byung
58b2(yum): zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
58b3(yum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mi bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su ying rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems cing
58b4(yum): bcig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sa sa
58b5(yum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa bo de dag thams cad rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i seMn
58b6(yum): spyong ba cig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub bapar bya'o// nyan thos dang rang
58b7(yum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rjes su ming ra
58b8(yum): dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa cig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
59a1(yum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rjes su
59a2(yum): yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa cig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
59a3(yum): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa chung ngu byin yang / thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bu na tshad med
59a4(yum): grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can tham
59a5(yum): cad kyi don du tshul khrims chung ngu bsrungs kyang / thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis/ ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med
59a6(yum): dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad
59a7(yum): kyi don du bzod pa chung ngu sgoms kyang / thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba'i tshul gyis/ ji bur na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par
59a8(yum): 'gyur gyiman yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslang bar bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson lnga/
59b1(yum): cung rung rnams kyang / thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na chad med zas med zangs kya dbab tu ya
59b2(yum): snyam na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan nu
59b3(yum): la mnyam par gnag kyang / thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba'i tshul gyis/ ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag du med par 'gyur gyi
59b4(yum): na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab chung ngu bsgongs
59b5(yum): kyang / thabs mkhas pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba'i tshul gyis/ ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na yang / byang chub
59b6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra/ dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
59b7(yum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
59b8(yum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
61a1(yum): tu dran pal bsgrub par bya// shar dwa ti'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngog te'i mdza' po dang / sdig pa'i grogs pa
61a2(yum): cad spang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes
61a3(yum): gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad bsnyen bkur bar 'dod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
61a4(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dung dang dud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
61a5(yum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
61a6(yum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
61a7(yum): bslab par bya'o// shar dwa ti'i bri byong chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
61a8(yum): bzlab par bya'o// shar da ti'i dbyung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi rigs bsgrub par 'dod pas// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
61b1(yum): / ra 'i dug na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsun mtshag gsum kyi gdu chu mi cang pa 'dodan du rnas par 'dod pas
61b2(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnon nu'i sa thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
61b3(yum): tu phyin bra la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mi dram
61b4(yum): khor 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems
61b5(yum): dpa'i sa las 'das par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
61b6(yum): chen po myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
61b7(yum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa gang dang gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim 'gror bya ba dang
61b8(yum): bkur stir bya ba dang / pu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rnam pa de dag pun gsum tshogs par 'gyur
62a1(yum): #/ par dga' bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem
62a2(yum): dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su dga' bar bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
62a3(yum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
62a4(yum): pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / me tog dang /
62a5(yum): bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / lhab
62a6(yum): lhub dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bIDUr+ya dang / dung dang / min shel dang / bye ru dang / sa li snam dang / dngul dang / ngas shing gir ba dang /
62a7(yum): rgyal po'i srid la sogs pa yo byad dang / longs spyod thams cad kyis sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par bya'o snyam na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
62a8(yum): bil bslab par bya'o// sha ro dwa ti bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gda'i klung gi kyi

62b2(yum): dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mos pa thob pa la 'god par 'dod pas
62b3(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyis
62b4(yum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i sems can thams cad theg pa chen po la gzung bar 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
62b5(yum): 'god par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par 'dod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'grod par 'dod pa dang / brtson
62b6(yum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
62b7(yum): la 'god par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i
62b8(yum): sems skyed pa cig 'ga' yang / snying po byang chub la nam 'dug gi bar du mi zad par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//

73a6(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das dbyings su dgod par 'dod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

73a8(yum): can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad tshul khrims kyi phung po dgod par 'dod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phreng po la dgod par 'dod pa dang /

73b2(yum): phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod
73b3(yum): pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lnga'i dkod par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par

76a1(yum): pa dang / shes rab kyi phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rnam par
76a2(yum): grol ba'i ye shes mthong bu'i phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
76a3(yum): 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /

76b1(yum): byed pa la spyod ci// sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sbyin pa rnam pa 'di ltar byin na ni 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ sbyin pa 'a
76b2(yum): ljor sbyin du ni rnal rigs tsho nang mtho ba'i rigs su skye/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin nA nI/ bram re che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/ sbyin pa 'di ltar bye na ni
76b3(yum): bdug che dang mtho ba'i rigs su s+ye/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ sbyin po 'di nyid la gnas pas/ rgyal po bzhi'i rigs kyi lnga'i nang du skye/ sbyin pa
76b4(yum): 'di ltar byin na ni/ sbyin pa 'di nyid la gnas pas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ sbyin pa de nyid lnga gnas
76b5(yum): pas/ mtshe ma'i lha'i'o nang du skye/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na nI/ sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pos/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye/ sbyin pa 'di ltar
76b6(yum): byin ni/ sbyin pa de nyid la gnas paste/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ sbyin pa 'di nyid la gnas pa'i/ gzhan
76b7(yum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pa'i/ bsam gtan dang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa
76b8(yum): 'di ltar byin na ni sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/ sbyin pa 'di nyid la gnas

78a4(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sbyod pa'i ni/ gzugs shes bya ba rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
78a5(yum): gzugs shes bya ba mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gzugs shes bya ba bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gzugs na/

78a7(yum): par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gzugs shes bya ba bani par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong // gzugs shes bya ba ma zhi par yang dag par
