216a3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po
216a4(yum): de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa de'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
216a5(yum): / gzungs kyi dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / stobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i snodag kyang tshogs mi che bar mngon du gyur ro// skye 'i sbyimached byas
216a6(yum): cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ blan med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
216a7(yum): ngar rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang rnam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sem sa dpa'i ma
216a8(yum): dpa chen thogs rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du/ chos gang tshul chos rnams dang 'du'i ma 'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/ drad pa 'am mi zad par 'gyur
216b1(yum): de la bu mod dam zhes bya bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang 'du ba'am 'bral bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'brang pa'am mi 'brang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dan
216b2(yum): rjes su mi mthong ngo // shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gnanas
216b3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du/ bdag gis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam
216b4(yum): mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa med do// mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do// mngon par 'tshang
216b5(yum): rgya bar 'gyur ba med do// sha ra dwa di'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
216b6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa
216b7(yum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lngar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa di'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
216b8(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings dang / chos rnams su bye brag du bya ba med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
217a1(yum): ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
217a2(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam khong du chud par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems so de ni 'di ltar des gang gis
217a3(yum): chos gang khong du chud por bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do// de yang 'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// mi stong zhes bya
217a4(yum): bar mi sbyor ro// shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson nas bya'o// shar da ti'i bu gzhan yang nga
217a5(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de'i tshe/ gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro// tshor
217a6(yum): ba dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor// stong pa nyid dang tshor bar mi sbyor ro// 'du shes dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang 'du shes su mi sbyor ro// 'du byed dang stong pa nyid du
217a7(yum): spyor/ 'od pa nyid du byung dumi spyod // rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du mi spyod/ stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor // ga da ma
217a8(yum): pa nga mig du mi sbyi // d-i byung ba nyid dus gyung // da pa nyid mgyu ro// 'di ste shA sa byung / rang nyid gyur ro//
217b1(yum): nyid mi spyong/ stong pa nyid dang lcer mi sbyor ro// lus dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus su mi sbyor ro// yid dang stong pa nyid mi stong/ myong ba dang
217b2(yum): yid mi sbyor ro// gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro// sna dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid deng slar mi sbyor ro// dring nga
217b3(yum): ba nyid du mi sbyor// stong pa nyid dang drir mi sbyor ro// ro dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyar/ stong pa nyid dang ror mi sbyor ro// reg dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg tu
217b4(yum): mi sbyor ro// chos dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos su mi sbyor ro// mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams su mi
217b5(yum): sbyor ro// gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su mi sbyor ro// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi
217b6(yum): sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i rnam
217b7(yum): par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// sgra'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgra'i khams su mi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang sngo
217b8(yum): pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// sna'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i khams su me
218a1(yum): sbyor ro// dri'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang dri'i khams su mi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/
218a2(yum): stong pa nyid dang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// lce'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i khams su mi sbyor ro// ro'i khams dang stong pa nyid du
218a3(yum): mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang ro'i khams su mi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor
218a4(yum): lus kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi khams su mi sbyor ro// rig bya'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg bya'i khams sum
218a5(yum): sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// yid kyi khams dang stong
218a6(yum): stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su mi sbyor ro// chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su mi sbyar ro/
218a7(yum): sbyin pa sa pa'i lta sna dang maud pa ny-id du b+h+yor / stong ny-ing dang me rnam par shes nga'i khams su sbya // de phyir na
218a8(yum): pa ma byor chu na da
218b1(yum): sa ma ngas su rgyas sa ma // sa maldan par da // sa yongs pa spyod/
218b2(yum): rnyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i drung chub tu yang myur du mngon par 'chang bya'o// shAr byer ba na pa'i bring ngu nga ba grang ci meng rung ste/ de dag gnang nagis
218b3(yum): rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor ne ces bya/ mchog ces bya/ rab mchog ces bya/ dul zhes b+h+yo/ gtso bri nas bya/ phyinom pa zhes bya'o//
218b4(yum): 'di lta spyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dri ni/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smin pa med pa'i rnal 'byor te/ blan med pa'i rnal 'byor to//
218b5(yum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar
218b6(yum): gyur pa'o// shir dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can tshad meng grangs med pa'i don byed kyang ngo 'di snyam du bdag
218b7(yum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa yin no na 'am/ brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
218b8(yum): lung bstan pa mdzad do// bdag gi lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to// bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// bdag gis ni sems can
219a1(yum): rnams yongs su smin par bya'o// bdug gis ni blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung tu mngon par rdzogs par spangs
219a2(yum): de/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir nan/ da ni 'di ltar chos kyi dadu la bye drug tu byed pa ming de/ de na chos
219a3(yum): dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bal spyod pa 'am/ gang las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bston par bya ba 'am/
219a4(yum): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de ci'i phyir nan/ byang chub sems
219a5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o// bdag gis 'du shes mi skye'o// srog gi 'du shes
219a6(yum): smr-i'o// 'gro ba'i 'du shes m+b+hi skye// gu pa'i 'du shes mI smra'o// skyes bu'i 'du shes mi skye'o// gang zug gi 'du shes mi skye'o// da can gyi
219a7(yum): gis mi skye'o// shad bdag gi 'dri shes mi skye'o// byeng pa po'i 'du nas kyi skyero// tshor ba po'i 'du shes mi spyod// rgas pa por 'du gas mi m+b+ha'o//
219a8(yum): bapo'i 'dugs mi bya'o// de ci byor che na/ deni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skyob mad cing 'gag pa med pa'i phying ngo // sems can la ni skye ba dang gag pa mad //
219b1(yum): gangs skye ba dang gag pa med pa deshes rab kyi ba rlob tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji lngar gyur te/ shar dri'i bude ltang spyod pa'i byung chub sems dpa' sems pa
219b2(yum): chen po na sems can skye ba med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems
219b3(yum): can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po yin/ sems can rang bzhin med
219b4(yum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po yin sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
219b5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
219b6(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byorades/ de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te/ gnas so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la
219b7(yum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par bsgrub po// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
219b8(yum): dge par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub po// shar dwa di'i bu bya
220a1(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni ser sna'i sems mi skyed do// tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems mi bskyed do// gnod
220a2(yum): par sems pa'i sems dang / 'alo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'tshal pa'i sems mi skyed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
220a3(yum): radwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byong
220a4(yum): 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha
220a5(yum): dwati'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnan
220a6(yum): nas ni 'phos te 'dir skyes pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lnga'i ris dang / mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par byor// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems
220a7(yum): da mas dpa chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi gzhananas 'as de 'dir byas pa de/ da rje shes rab kyi rom du na de'i byer rnam
220a8(yum): myung du 'grub pa ste/ che rabs 'di 'dis nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la
220b1(yum): rnarnam par gzhog go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing klung dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs dang 'tsho myong
220b2(yum): dang de dag du yang skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//
220b3(yum): ra ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shrI 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/
220b4(yum): de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o// gzungs kyi sgod du/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der mo 'dus pa med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
220b5(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shrI 'phos nas mi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
220b6(yum): sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog
220b7(yum): pa ma yin no// de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi skyo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro// sha ra~M dwa ti'i bu gang khyod kyis
220b8(yum): skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang tu
222a1(yum): / shing 'tsho stong ba dang / de dag du skye bar 'gyur ba yod do// de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa'i rnal 'byor dngam 'bral bas/ bskal pa bzang ba
222a2(yum): 'di nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
222a3(yum): gtan dang po la yang snyams par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang stoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la sems par 'jug/ bsam gtan ba'i ba
222a4(yum): la yang stobs par 'jug/ byams pa la yang soms par 'jug/ snying rje chen po la yang stoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ gtang skams
222a5(yum): la yang skams par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas sku mtshad la yang skams par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang sems par 'jug/ cung zad
222a6(yum): med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'dushes med pa 'du shes med mi skye mched la yang skams par 'jug cing / de dag thabs mkhas pas bas
222a7(yum): gan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis m-i n+tar/ de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang rgyal rigs tshe ring bzo ba'i rnams
222a8(yum): su skyel/ zam ze zhing mthang ba'i rigs su gyur/ byin bdas tsha dang mam pa mas su rgyan/ da yang sangadapal bzhi ma pa'i bye pa medaH/ sems sas
222b1(yum): / 'bru' gyu yang ba mas dang pal yang mamam par 'ju pa sa sa na
222b2(yum): dasams nagasas pa la yang thams par 'ju/ bsam gtad ban pa la yangamams par 'jam/ byams pa la yang mams pa
222b3(yum): / sna bas ya rnams par gyu/ ma du sa sa/
222b4(yum): dpags mthas yas sna mtshangs yang skams par 'jug/ bung ba med pa'i rtse mchar la yang sems par 'jug/ 'jugs pa rdzogs da
222b5(yum): mched la yang rnams par 'jug/ de dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzi dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis me b+he yang ma
222b6(yum): de dag de rgyal ba cher ba ban 'dis kyi lha rnams dang bskal ba mnyam par skye'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mjam par skye'o/ mchisa'i
222b7(yum): rnams dang bskul ba mnyam par skyer/ dpa' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bya'o// 'phrul dba'i la rnams dang skal ba mnyam par na/ na/
222b8(yum): dbang byeng kyi lha rnams 'angaskal ba mnyam par rtse'o// de dag na gnas shing sems par rnams las su smin par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa mi sung na pa ze
223a1(yum): / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyal par byung / bar pa'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshan za shes rab kyi
223a2(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan
223a3(yum): gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtar bzhi pa la yang rnams par 'jug/ byams pa la yang sems par 'jug/ snying rje la yang skams par 'ju
223a4(yum): dpa' ba la yang sems par 'jug/ gtang stoms la yang skams par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas
223a5(yum): skye mched la yang sems par 'jug/ zung bang med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'dugs 'bed 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par
223a6(yum): 'jug pa yong de/ de dag ni 'di nas shi 'bas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o// de dag de na 'ang tshangs pa tshangs tshe ni dbang tshan po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la da
223a7(yum): bsgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na yang mchog dam pa bul du bya bar 'gyur te/ de dag de mabong cing gang na bzhin gshegs pa dam btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs
223a8(yum): ba'i sangs rgyas rnams mang par sangs rgyas shing / sangs rgya ma tshas kyilab la banang ba bzhugs padal bu'i sangs rgyas kyizhing ras sangs rgyas kyi meng du
223b1(yum): nad 'dzud/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngag la'ang chas kyi 'bar la bsar ba'i don du gsal ba btab pa zung
223b2(yum): shar ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa cha gcig gis thags pags rab kyi pa ral tu phyin pa la spang ba dag thabs pa khas pas
223b3(yum): gan nga ba la yang rnams par 'jug/ bsamasatan gnyis pa la yang rnams par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsus pa la yang rnams par 'jug/
223b4(yum): bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la snyoms par 'jug/ seng rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang sems par 'jug/ rnam
223b5(yum): mtha' yas skye mched la yang sems par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang stobs par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang sems par 'jug
223b6(yum): 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yang yongs su bsgom/ yang dag par spong ba ba'i yang yongs su snyam
223b7(yum): dbang ba lnga yang yangasas bsas/ sabs lnga yang mangs su bas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdu yang yangs su bsam/ 'phags pa'i lam ya
223b8(yum): brkyang ba yeng yangs su bsdum/ stong panyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / sman pa ming pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang sems par 'jug ci / de dag gi bang ris ma gru
223b9(yum): dga' ba la yang snyoms pa
224a1(yum): yod do// de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyeran bkur cing / de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyang pa spyod pa de/ dga' ldan gi lha dang skal ba ma
224a2(yum): bar gyur/ de dag dar tshe tshul bzhin du gnas nas dbang ba ma nyams pa dang / drang zing shes bzhin du la bye ba khrag khrig brgya mang dri mas bska mdud byas nas 'din
224a3(yum): babasor te/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ringasna tshogs ngag tu chos kyi 'khor la bskor ba dag kyang yang
224a4(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa dum bu dang po/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ sha ra dwa dwa'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
224a5(yum): mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye/ gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye bar/ de dag de bzhin gshegs
224a6(yum): ba na bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ring 'grong / bkur bsting / phung ba mchong bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing des sangs rgyas kyi nang dul
224a7(yum): gakyang yang / pa'i bu di ga yang byang chub sems dpa' sems ba da / brlags pargya ma thub bad/ mang ba gas badrug bde nas
224a8(yum): rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi ling gang mtheg pa cher ba ma gtogs par nyam thos kyi ther pa dang 'ang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi bsgrag pa de la bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
224b1(yum): sa na du drang bdag kyang yong/ shar ti'i bu 'di sar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan pa mngan pa chags pa drug zab bang yang na
224b2(yum): dadag gis rnam par gyi 'ang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangar sems can rnams kyis tshe dpag tu mang ba del bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod padag
224b3(yum): yod/ dge slong shar pa'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa mngon par shes pa drug pa thob pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang ma sa
224b4(yum): kyi sgra ma grag pa dang / chos kyi sna mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gi sgra grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing / sangs rgyas kyi legs par brdza
224b5(yum): chos kyi legs par brjod/ dge 'dun gyi legs par brjod pas/ sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra ngas sems dang bar gyur
224b6(yum): gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag du skye bar gyur par byed pa de dag kyang yang ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
224b7(yum): sems dang ba skyed byin cad bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar
224b8(yum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang ba lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags par/
225a1(yum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen
225a2(yum): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thog nas de dgar yang dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/
225a3(yum): gzugs med pa'i khams su mi skye zhing / de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yang ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba
225a4(yum): rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dgadang pos sems bskyed pa nyid kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa yang yod ngo // shar dwa ti'i bu
225a5(yum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshor ba dang po sems skyeng pa nyid kyis/ blan meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngan par 'tshang brgya na
225a6(yum): mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yangs
225a7(yum): sa mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos skal pa 'ang bskal ba'i lha mar gnas pa dag kyang yang / shar dwa ti'i bu
225a8(yum): ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' char ba dang pa sems bsrung ba nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha ral tu byed pa'i rnal 'byor la sems par 'jug cing dngas kya
225b1(yum): byang rnathamams ca' mangs da 'a che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya gang ngub dang ldan pagasangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ang 'a/ sangs rgyas bca ldan 'angs
225b2(yum): bam bad/ sems can rnams yangs sa smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ngag par bya ba'i ngan du 'dod bdag kyang yang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
225b3(yum): dnga' sems dpa 'char ze shes rab kyi 'arol tu byin pa la snang ba/ bsams ba ni zab pa chung med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i grangs par 'jug pa pani
225b4(yum): thob bdag/ bsam ga na dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis/ tshul dums rnam par rtse zhing 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan dang pom
225b5(yum): snyoms par 'jug go// de dag bsam gtan dang po las 'das nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i sems par 'jug pa las langs
225b6(yum): nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag go/ 'gog pa'i
225b7(yum): thams par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gsum pa las langs mam 'gog pa'i sams par 'jug pam
225b8(yum): mnyam par gzhag go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan ba'i ba la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/
226a1(yum): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gnag no/ 'gog pa'i stoms par 'jug pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la rnams
226a2(yum): par 'jug go// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag go// 'gog pa'i skams par 'jug pa las
226a3(yum): las nas/ rnam shes mtha' las skye mched la soms par 'jug go// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i sems par 'jug pa la
226a4(yum): mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// cung zad med pa'i skye mched la
226a5(yum): langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes mer skye mche
226a6(yum): la sems par 'jug pa// 'du shes med 'dre shes med men skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i skams par 'jug pa la mnyam par gnas na/ shAr dwa ti'i
226a7(yum): daltar byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' ma ze shes rab kyi paral du byed pa/ bas pa khas pa dang sa pa rnams pasam ga nang chang med padang / ti 'dzin rnams
226a8(yum): bar 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing sems par 'jug pa dag kyang yang ba/ sha rang ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
226b1(yum): ban ya 'an pa/ yang dag par grang ba banatha chu 'phrul gyi ga pa'an thab / dbang bas byas
226b2(yum): yan lag bdud zab pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa zab pa/ 'phags pa'i bdad pab ni zab pa/ chang meng pa rnams zab pa/ gzugs pa
226b3(yum): stobs par 'jug pa rnams thob pa/ rnam par thar pa rgyad thob pa/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i skams par 'jug pa dgu thob pa/ spong ba nyid dang / mtshar mazeng ba
226b4(yum): sman pa meng pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams zab pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thab
226b5(yum): mi 'jigs pa pazhi thob pa/ sas yang dag par rig pa bzhi zab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dzes pa bcung thob pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sde bsam po thob pa kyang
226b6(yum): rgyur tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ lan cig phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ dgra bcam panyid
226b7(yum): thob par mi byed/ rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyad cing za bas mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas/ 'phags pa'i ma
226b8(yum): yan lag brkyang ba sems can rnams la yongs su ston par byed do// sems can de dag ngas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir/
227a1(yum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub
227a2(yum): thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shar dwa 'i'i bu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi zas bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes pang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems
227a3(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bzod pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus rnam par spyod pa
227a4(yum): ngag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu'adi ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa la gnas shing dga' ldan
227a5(yum): gnas yongs su srung ba dag kyang yongad pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang por shes rabar bya'o// shar dwa
227a6(yum): 'di lar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan za shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ba/ bsam gtan bzhi rnab pa/ tshang med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs
227a7(yum): mang pa'i rnams par 'jug pa pa'i thob pa / byang chub kyi thugs kyi rgyas sam bcucu bdu zab dang / rang bdags padrug thob pa// nga ban lagags
227a8(yum): sabs bcuthob pa/ mi 'jigs pa pa mi zab pa/ saM sa yang dag par rig pa pani thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob bdag/ 'chags
227b1(yum): 'badu ba pa nayang du chung bar bya 'ab na du myang kyang bden pa pa ma rtags par mi byed pa dag kyang yod pa/ shar dwapa'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems da ldan
227b2(yum): dngas mche cag thogs pa gas par byar// shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa rol tu phyir pa drug la srung bdag 'dzi
227b3(yum): gyi khabs nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing / de dag sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par sprul pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag sa byang ba
227b4(yum): kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sde sa mi byas ma pa grangs med tshad med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
227b5(yum): mngon par 'dzang brgya'o// shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems cad rnams
227b6(yum): drungag par 'tsha \u0f7f/ nam yang gnong par 'gyur ba'i tshig me swA/ brjod par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi las dang / yid kyi las ma byeng ba dag car yangang / shar pa'i bu
227b7(yum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don du drug tu brtsor pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyam
227b8(yum): du 'dong zhing sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsupa pa rgyan gcod pa dag kyang yod do// shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyid pa drugs
228a1(yum): shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar bsgrub cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang sdom 'ang
228a2(yum): pa rnams la skom dang / gzhon pa 'dong ba rnams la gzhon pa dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams
228a3(yum): la 'phreng ba dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / mal stan 'dod pa rnams la mal stan dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / rgyan 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang /
228a4(yum): 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyis yongs su spang cing / 'tsho ba'i yo byad skyer med pa yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yang de/ sha rang
228a5(yum): bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha ral tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar byas te/ sems can rnams
228a6(yum): lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa la rab tu dgod pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas
228a7(yum): shi / bzang ba'i pha rol tu phyir pa lhur byas te sems par rnams khro ba med pa dang / gnang sems med pa la rab tu dgong par drug kyang yang ngo po/ shar dwa ti'i bu'
228a8(yum): gar yang byang chub semam pa' sems pa' cha ba pa la byed pa dgas gnas shing / bcar 'grus kyi pa la khyod bzhir byas pa/ sems ca rnams /
228b1(yum): thams thams cadas mang ba kya pa la btung bang bangadag kyang yangs/ sha 'i bu ltar yang byang chubam sa sa dpa' mams sa rab pa la byu ba /
228b2(yum): laganas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyiran ba ltar byas te/ sems can rnams ni banas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang/ 'dod pa las dber pa la rabatang gang bdag
228b3(yum): ma/ sharang ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ba ral tu byed pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol 'byor pa ltung byas na/
228b4(yum): da bzhi gshegs pa'i saci 'dra bde 'dra ba'i lus su ma bar sprul te/ sems cad dbul pa'i sems sanangs/ byol sang gsuM gnas pa'i sems ca rnams pa
228b5(yum): gshing rje'i 'jig rten pa'o sems rnams la ngang sang thams cad las yang dag par zla ba'i phyir chos stong pa dag kyang yang ngo // shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
228b6(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyir ba drug la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sa ci 'dra ba 'dra ba'i lus su mngor bar sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang
228b7(yum): 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du 'dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bster bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems pa
228b8(yum): dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyis zhing gis yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas ng+ge dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung steng bas kyang rgyan
229a1(yum): khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing da ngag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis na
229a2(yum): pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'dong zhing sems can rnams la chos sten pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
229a3(yum): pa rnams la bsnyed bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs
229a4(yum): rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad bar du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag
229a5(yum): tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha sug sme bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'ong gang 'ba'i klung gi bye ma snyeng pa
229a6(yum): tu 'dod zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa nga/ chos nyam cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas
229a7(yum): nga gi la rnam par bya 'angs kya zung bar byang cing dadag sangs rgyas kyi 'ding dag gi batshan pa yangs su bzungs/ rabs kyang rgya cha bzang bar du'aphams pa'i sas
229a8(yum): rgyas kyi zhing mang pa yangs su bsgrubacing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dngag du byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' cha ba che gcig gis thams pa gsul skye bar byed bdag thamasas
229b1(yum): byang byugs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i klung ga bye ma snyed ngag tu 'ad zhing sems can rnams la ches snyan pa dang / nga bzhi gshegs pa la bzher bkung bang dang / sa
229b2(yum): cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthang bar byeng cing / rang ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag se mtshan ma mangs
229b3(yum): bzangs rabs kyang rgyam zang bar du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang mang ba yangs su bsdu bcang sangs rgyas kyi'idang rag tu byang chub sangs dpa' sa
229b4(yum): ma chen ba chegacig gis thags pa shas ga sdu bar byang bdag cang yang ngo / byal bar kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rte sangs rgyas kyi'ang gang 'di'i glang gi byem steng ngag tu
229b5(yum): zhing sems can rnams la chos ster pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas ni
229b6(yum): nang mamar tha dam par bye ba dag kyang bzung bar byad cing / dngag sangs rgyas kyi 'ang de dag gi mtshan pa yongs su bzungs/ ngabs sang rgya cha bzung bar du 'phags pa'i san
229b7(yum): rgyas kyi zhing mang ba yongs su bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar phreng ba da/
229b8(yum): yod do/ shar lho phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du 'dong zhing sems can rnams la chos stor pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
230a1(yum): la bsnyed bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ba
230a2(yum): byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub
230a3(yum): cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa ga kyang yod do// lho rab kyi phyogs mtshams
230a4(yum): kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bster bkur byed pa dang /
230a5(yum): chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngag gi mtshan
230a6(yum): ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa
230a7(yum): sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag/ skyeb phred pa dag kyang yang / nub byang ga phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i klung gi byer steng dag tu
230a8(yum): 'dod bzhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor bkur byeng ba dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas
230b1(yum): nga gis dab par bya bangs car mthong bar byeng ba/ rang ga sangs rgyas pa' nga dag sa mdza ma yangasasu sa/ dbus bzang
230b2(yum): sangs rgyas kyi meng rang ba yongs su bsdu bcang / sangs rgyas kyi nang dngas tu byang chub sems dpa' sems da 'tshan pa ches cig ces thogs pa btsus byu zung
230b3(yum): kyang yang // rag gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'ang gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma gong ngag tu 'di zhing sems can rnams la chos snar pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
230b4(yum): bsnyed bkur byed ba dang/ chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yang tan rnams par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing/ de dgas
230b5(yum): rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang ba yongs su bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang/
230b6(yum): tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshor ba che gcig gis thogs pas stug skye bar byed pa dag kyang yang / seng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ganga' ga'i klung gi bye ma da
230b7(yum): ngag tu 'drang 'ang sems cad rnams la chos sbyar pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstar bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'du da
230b8(yum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshar ma yongs su bzung bste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyang pan
231a1(yum): du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher pa tshe gcig gis
231a2(yum): pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa'i tshe/ mchen po'i mtshan
231a3(yum): sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/ dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yongs su dag pa de sems mos pa dag gis skye bo dag
231a4(yum): bdang bos pa skyed de/ de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sems can de dag kyang sems bos par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mtha
231a5(yum): gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha
231a6(yum): rol tu phyin pa la skyong ba'i tshe/ lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// ngag yongs su dag pa la bsrab par bya'o// yid yongs su dag pa la bsrab par bya'o/ 68
231a7(yum): date'i bu 'di lar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' char ba pha rol tu phyir 'drug la sbyang bdag dbang za shir tu gsal ba zab nas/ dadag dbang ban
231a8(yum): gsal bar dag gis bdas mi stod cing ga'ang ma sra pa dag kyang mdzang/ shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang mams bsrung sa
231b1(yum): d+h+ya nga/ dUr ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shir byer ma lhag pa'i mthub pa'i bye du/ rnam yang dngul ba la
231b2(yum): log par 'grib pang ma mang mi ltung ba dag kyang mdang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshon pa dang bsapas bsrung gying byung ban
231b3(yum): thob kya ba dadu/ rnam yang dge bcu'i las kyi lam pa gang bdag kyang yang re/ shar da ba'i bu'iding yang yang byang chub sems pa' ma pa pa tsham ba
231b4(yum): dwa'i byin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal bar gyur nas/ de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems mdza
231b5(yum): tu dgod pa dang / sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yang na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
231b6(yum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgyal sring yongs su bzung te/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
231b7(yum): kyi stong dum la gangs shing dngag la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya srang du mi mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dkyil mthung
231b8(yum): cad dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
231b9(yum): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid ca
232a1(yum): nam blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyis bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba de dang nam yang bral bar mi byed pa
232a2(yum): dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no// shar dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub
232a3(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyi gor dbya'o//
232a4(yum): skad ces bka' stsal padang / tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
232a5(yum): che ba'i lus khan ma tha ba dang bcas pa gang legs/ ngag gi las kha na me tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ yid kyi las kha na mthe ba dang bcas pa gang lags/
232a6(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing / 'di ni lus yin gyis nges ni lus kyi
232a7(yum): shig brtsam/ 'di ni dag yin gyis nges ni ngag gi las shig brtsam/ 'dir yid yin gyis nges ni yid kyis las shig brtsam gamar/ da ni shar dati'i bu byang chub
232a8(yum): sems da' sems dpa' chen pa'i lus da ga dang yid kyilas tsal pa la mtho ba dang bcas pa'o// 'da'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tsha /
232b1(yum): byun pal byung ba 'as ga dang / gagangs/ yang bang pas 'dus parnamams bsnang ba'ang/ rgyal mas pa rnamapa bad
232b2(yum): nang thams kyi sems bskyed pa'am/ le la'i sems bsdud pa'am/ 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ shes rab 'tshal ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba lta bu'i
232b3(yum): ming rigasas/ ngag mi dmigs sa/ sems mi dmigs so// bar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la smra
232b4(yum): lus kyi gnas dam lar bstong pa dang / ngag gi banas ljon bskyed pa dang / yid kyi gnas ngar ler bskyeng pa sa mdum shes par ma byan/ ngang gnas meng ngam
232b5(yum): zhen/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len pa yongs su spyod
232b6(yum): ngag gi gnas ngan lan yongs su myong // yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su spyong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu 'dini byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams kyis
232b7(yum): kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// ngag gi las khan ma tho ba meng pa'i/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// gsil ba bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
232b8(yum): sems dpa' chan pa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len srung ba lags/ ngag gi gnas ngan le skyong ba lags/ yid kyi gnas ngan len pa la skyeng ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
233a1(yum): bka' stsal pa/ sha rang ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs pa/ ngag mi dmigs/ sems mi dmigs ma
233a2(yum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su srung ba yin/ ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su bsrung ba yin/
233a3(yum): yid kyis gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no// sha ra ti'i bu bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po steng nas phyin chang dge ba bcu'i las
233a4(yum): kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sems sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag du rgyun me chang par sems can thams ca
233a5(yum): la snying rje chen ba'i sems nye bar gnon/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len dang / yid kyi gnas
233a6(yum): ngan len yin yongs su dag pa zhes ngas pashad // sha ra 'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub gi la/
233a7(yum): yongs su chung zhing / sbyang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la snang ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyang ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la snang ba dang / brgyan 'a
233a8(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa la srung ba dag kyang yang / gsal babamam ldan/
233b1(yum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sa
233b2(yum): dpa' chen tha shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyang pa'i tshe/ nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang / ngag le dmigs pa med pa dang / yid la dmigs pa mang ba dang /
233b3(yum): sbyin pa'i pharol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med dang / bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med bar
233b4(yum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa chen
233b5(yum): ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang
233b6(yum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med par gyur pa de ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba'i byang chub kyi lam yin
233b7(yum): 'dig mas thams cad la dmigs pa med cing blang ba med pa dang do ba med pa'o// ra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba rgya la rjes bung rlung
233b8(yum): thub pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
233b9(yum): byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' tshom po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing cham car du byed pa de dag ni sras kyang grub pa med do// gsol ba bcom ldan 'as
234a1(yum): / gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang / tshor la rnams sems zang pa dang / 'du shes la rlom sems med pa dang / 'du byed la rlob sems med pa dang /
234a2(yum): rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mig dang gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i ngang sbal rlob sems med pa dang / sA dang dril rnam sems
234a3(yum): med pa dang / lce dang rol rnab sems med pa dang / lus dang reg la rlom sems med pa dang / yid dang chos la srab sems med pa dang / sa'i khams la rnam sems
234a4(yum): pa dang / chu'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / me'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rab mkha'i khams la rmon
234a5(yum): sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam sems med pa dang / rna ba'i khams la rnam sems med pa dang / mig gi khams la rnob sems med pa dang
234a6(yum): gzugs kyi khams la rnam sems med pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlob sems med pa dang / rna ba'i khams la rnab 'a sems med pa dang / sA'i kha
234a7(yum): la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sku'i khams la rdzoms pas med pa dang / dri'i khams la rlom sems
234a8(yum): med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam sems med pa dang / lho'i khams la rnams pas me pa dang / ro'i khams la nam sepas med pa nga
234b1(yum): pa pa byas pa'i 'angs larnamamams pa bas lum gyi khams la rnam mangs da pa nga / rag sa khams larnamasams pa pa zhus pa daya ngan
234b2(yum): pa'i khams la rnob sems med pa dang / yid kyi khams la rnob sems med pa dang / chos kyi khams la rlob sems med pa dang / yid gyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la
234b3(yum): rnab sems zang pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar byung ba la rnam sems mang ba dang / sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyid pa la rna ma sems bad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha ral tu phying pa
234b4(yum): rnam sems zang pa dang / bzang ba'i pha rol tu phyir ba la rlom sems med pa dang / brtsor 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la rab sems med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi ba
234b5(yum): byid pa la rnam sems meng ba dang / shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la rnam sems med pa dang / rang stong pa nyid la rlob sems med pa dang / phyi spang panyi larabasapas
234b6(yum): ba dang / phyi rang stong pa nyid la rlob sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / cher ba stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dor dmang /
234b7(yum): stong pa nyid la rnam sems zer pa dang / 'dus byas byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rlob sems med pa dang / mtha' las
234b8(yum): bstang panyid la rlob sems med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems rang ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang bzhin srung /
235a1(yum): / pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / chos thabs cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlob sems med pang
235a2(yum): mi dpags pa nyid la rnam sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / ngo bo nyid srung ba nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /
235a3(yum): dngas pa med pa'i nga ba nyid srung pa ched la rlom sems med pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba ni la rlom sems med pa dang / yang dag par spang ba ba'i la mam
235a4(yum): sems med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / dbang po lnga la rlob sems med pa dang / stobs lnga la rlom sems med pa dang / byang chub kyi
235a5(yum): yan lag bdun la rnam sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems pang pa dang /
235a6(yum): bas pa gta bzhil rdzob sems med pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rnam sems med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sabs par 'jug pa bzhi la rnam sems med pangang /
235a7(yum): rnam par thar pa brgyang la rlom sems med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgul rnamasams med pa dang / stong pa nyid la rnam sems med padang /
235a8(yum): mam ma pa la rnam sems rang bdang / spong ba bang pa la rnamasams pa bang/ pa migs pa rnams la rnam sems meng bang /
235b1(yum): mas / gzus panarnams la rnam sems mngapa dang / de ma shegs pa'i skabs bcus rnamasems ma pa nga pa'as sgra
235b2(yum): meng parda/ rnas sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rnam sems med pa dang / byams par ba la rnams pas med pa dang / snying rdo chen pa la rna sems ri ba
235b3(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnam sems med pa dang / rgyur tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rnam sems med pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la
235b4(yum): rlom sems med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa
235b5(yum): lam gyi rnam par shes pa la rnam sems med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlob sems med pa dang / 'khor ba la rlom sems med pa dang /
235b6(yum): mya ngang las 'das pa la rnam sems med par gyur pa de'itshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnams par 'jal ba yin
235b7(yum): sras kyang thub pa meng du shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dganas te/ thams cad mthar pa nyid kyi
235b8(yum): shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de dang ldan pas rab yang na song rnams su mi skye/ me dbul zhing 'phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te/ lus gang
236a1(yum): dang ldan pas lha dang mi dang lAm yin du bcas pa'i nang na spang par gyur de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa
236a2(yum): sha rang ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes de dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' char pa mam
236a3(yum): ngangs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing 'phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyis nang na spang ba
236a4(yum): 'gyur ba de lta bu lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
236a5(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gying bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
236a6(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snang ba mthong rdo/ chos kyang nyan tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge bdud dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi man
236a7(yum): rnam par bye bdas kyang mthang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' mam mi shes ngal bung nga ldan pas ni lce phyugs kyi 'jig car gyi khams gang ga'i klung na byam skye
236a8(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gapa ga'i glang gi bu ma snyed kyang mthong / chas kyang sar to// byang chub sems dpa'i den bdun
236b1(yum): sa kyid gim na rnam par bya ba dag kyang mthang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ye shes ngas bu dang la pas ni rlab byags kyi 'angs
236b2(yum): khams gang 'ga'i klung gi byeng ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos
236b3(yum): / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dung dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba
236b4(yum): nasanges bu nga ldan pas na/ byung phyogs kyi 'jig rter gyi khams gang 'ba'i klung gi byed pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
236b5(yum): sangs rgyas gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong nga/ chas kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyis 'di yon tan dam par bye bdas
236b6(yum): mthang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ri/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'am chos kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dnga' ra'i gi bye ma
236b7(yum): kye de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'
236b8(yum): dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/
237a1(yum): bar lce'i phyogs parnams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
237a2(yum): rgyas gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yor tan rnam par phye ba dag
237a3(yum): kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni lce rab kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang dga'i klung
237a4(yum): gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / chos kyang nyan to//
237a5(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba ye
237a6(yum): de lta bu dang ldar pas ni nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rter gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs par gra ba tsam pa yang dag par rdzas
237a7(yum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'ga'i lung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / chos kyang sbyar to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyi ring gi yang tan rnam par
237a8(yum): bdag kyang mthong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cha ba ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rter gi khams gang lala'i thung /
237b1(yum): nga na gas pa pa ngan par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la 'amang sa byam snang yang ma ba sa b+h+ya
237b2(yum): sems pa'i dge 'dur dang sangs rgyas kyi nang gi yan tan rnam par phye bdag kyang mthang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba ma shes
237b3(yum): dang ldan bas ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma skad kyi de bzhir gshegs pa dgra pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas da
237b4(yum): 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni kyang mthong ngo / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dnga'i sla ngasargyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong
237b5(yum): ye shes nga lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed do// chos kyi 'du shes mi bskyed do// dge 'dun
237b6(yum): 'du shes mi bskyed do// nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi bskyed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi bskyed do/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi bskyed ngo //
237b7(yum): sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes pa bskyed do/ bdag gi 'du shes mi bskyed ngo / gzhan gyi 'du shes mi bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mo bskyed
237b8(yum): ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshor ba ni sbyar ba'i pha rol tu phyir ba la skyed de/ spyir ba'i pha rol tu phyir pa mi dmigs so// tshul
238a1(yum): khribs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyid pa mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyir ba la spyad de/ bzod pa'i
238a2(yum): rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// bsam gtad gyi pha rol tu phyin
238a3(yum): pal spyad de/ bsam gtar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs sa
238a4(yum): nang stong pa nyid ska ba ste/ rang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// phyi stang pa nyid skam ste/ phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid slob ste/ ra
238a5(yum): bcid mi dmigs sa/ snang ba zer snang pa 'ings pa 'i/ snang ba nyid snang bting ba dmigs sa/ chen po snang ba'i ska ba ste/ na pa snang btsu po da
238a6(yum): ngam pa snang ba nyid snyam ste/ deng dam pa skyed pa nyid mi dmigs so// 'dus byas sang pa nyings pa ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas
238a7(yum): spang ba nying sa ma ste/ 'dus ma snang pa nyid mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa snang ba nyid skam ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gi dmigs sa/
238a8(yum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stang btsongs pa ste/ thog ma ngang tham med pa stong panyid mi dmigs pa/ rang ba med pa stong pa nyid skaman/ rang pa med pa snang pa kyang me /
238b1(yum): sa rang ba ra snang ba nyid sa pa ste/ rang bzhir snang pa nyid ma dmigs so// chos thams cad snang ba zhengs paste/ chas thams pa snang ba nyid mi dmigasas
238b2(yum): rang gi mtshan cing song pa cid skab ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs sa/ mi dmigs pa snang pa nyid sa pa ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//
238b3(yum): rngas pa zang ba snang pa nyid sems/ dngas pa meng ba snang ba nyid ma dmigs sa/ ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid sngam ste/ nga ba nyid snang bzhing meng migs sa/ dngas pa zeng ma
238b4(yum): rdobacing sang ba nyid sgob ste/ nges pa med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// drar pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi skam ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bani ming nga
238b5(yum): so/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgo ba ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi snga ma ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par mas ming chags
238b6(yum): nga bang po lnga slob ste/ dbang po lnga rnams mi dmigs so// stabs lnga skam ste/ stobs rnams mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi yang lag 'dun srom
238b7(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i
238b8(yum): bder pa rnams sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams mi dmigs so// bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ bsam gtan rnabs mi dmigs so// tshad med pa rna
239a1(yum): slob ste/ tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so/ gzugs med pa'i stoms par 'jug pa rnams sdom ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
239a2(yum): dmigs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu spo ste/ mthar gyis
239a3(yum): mams pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs so/ song ba nyid ska ste/ stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// mngon pa med pas pa ste/ mtshan ma med mi dmigs sa//
239a4(yum): smon pa med pa skam ste/ smon pa med pa mi dmigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams sgo ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzir rnams slob ste/
239a5(yum): ting nge 'dzir rnams mi dmigs so// gzungs kyi sgra rnams sgob ste/ gzungs kyi sde rnams mi dmigs so// de bzhir gshegs pa'i stobs bcus pa te/ de bzhin
239a6(yum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs so/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi smra pa ste/ sa sol
239a7(yum): dag par dag pa pa'i rnams mi dmigs sa/ byams pa char bsnum na/ rnams brgyan pa mi darigasas/ snying rje chen za de/ seng rje chen pa m-i pagasas
239a8(yum): sangs rgyakyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dzes pa bco btang mi dmigs so/ rgya tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sam so/ rgyad tu
239b1(yum): sa dum dgas pa/ 'a ga phyir rang 'du 'bras bu mam / lam thag phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu sa dmags sa/ phyin ma'ong bar 'bas rnas
239b2(yum): ma'ang ba'i 'bras bu ma migs sa/ dgra bcom pacid snyam sa/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs sa/ rang byang chub skam ste/ rang byang chub med legs so/
239b3(yum): lam gyi rnam par shes pa 'ad ska pa ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs sa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa slob ste/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmi
239b4(yum): so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas
239b5(yum): kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mthams cad kyang yang dag par rjes mi mthong ba/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub
239b6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ mig lnga rab tu thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod do// lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste
239b7(yum): mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig go// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
239b8(yum): dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i na
240a1(yum): mam sa pag yang brgya mtha ba mang/ bu byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chan pa mas pas dngas chang banyis ma
240a2(yum): ba mang/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad gsum brgya mthang ba yong/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpal
240a3(yum): sems dpa' chen ba'i ga'i mig gis dpag chang ba ni brgya mthong ba yod do/ shar dati'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sha'i mig gis dang sachangs
240a4(yum): brgya mthang ba yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba'i sha'i mig gis dpag chad drug brgya mthong ba yang / sharadwa ti bu byang chub sems papa
240a5(yum): sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bdur brgya mthong ba yang / shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa'i shi'i mig gis dngag chang brgyan
240a6(yum): brgya mthong ba ladang / shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba'i sha'i tshig gis dpag tshang dgu brgya mthong ba yang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem
240a7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pa pa'i mig gis pag chang sang mthong ba ya / rapa'i bzung chubasams dpa' rnams dpa'achar ba'i na'i tshigapas ma
240a8(yum): mthang ba 'dza/ gar pa'i dbyang chub sams pa thams dpa' ba'i ma mas sa nga nyis pa tshang ba yang / gar ti'i bu byang chub mas pa
240b1(yum): dnga' chen po'i sha'i mig gis gling gsum pa mthong ba yang / ba ra dadwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba'i sha'i mig gis blang ba ni nga'i 'jam
240b2(yum): gi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis song gi 'jig rter gyi khams mthong ba yang ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu
240b3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis song gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
240b4(yum): chen po'i sha'i mig gis steng gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams mthong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po'i shI'i mig yongs su pa
240b5(yum): nga'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag bgang lags/ bcod ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
240b6(yum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams kyis lnga'i mig
240b7(yum): gang yin pa de de byang chub sems dpa' sems dngas te rab tu shas/ mtshe ma'i lha'i rnams kyis lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes
240b8(yum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu sheso// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas
241a1(yum): rab tu shes so// gnar 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yid ba de byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs ris kyi lha
241a2(yum): rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yid pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu zhes sa/ tshangs lnga te phar gyi la rnams kyis lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems pa
241a3(yum): rab tu shes so// tshangs pa kur 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu phyi shes so// tshangs pa chen gyi lha rnabs kyi lha rnabs/
241a4(yum): kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sna ba'i la rnams kyis lha'i mig gang yid bde ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shesas
241a5(yum): rlung snang gi lnga rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de de byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshang med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis lnga'i mig gang yin pa de byang chub sem
241a6(yum): dpas rab tu shes so// kun sam pa'i lha rnams kyi lnga'i mig gang yid pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yi/
241a7(yum): pade de byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung dge'i lha rngabs kyi lha'i mig gang yid bde byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes sa/ tshad med dge ba'i lharnas
241a8(yum): kyi lha'i mig gang yid pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rab shes so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lnga'i mig gang yid bde byang chub sems dpas rab tu shems
241b1(yum): che ba'i lhurnams kyi lha'i migagang yod pa de ni byang chub sems dparab tu shems/ chung che'i ldan pas kyi lha'i rig pang yod pade byang chub se sa bas tunas
241b2(yum): chang zang che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yid bde ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de 'i byang chub sa
241b3(yum): dbas rab tu shes so/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yid pa de ni byang chub sems dpa rab tu shes so// mi 'dung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa
241b4(yum): de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes sa/ 'a tu mthong ba'i lnga rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa deni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gya nom sdang ba'i
241b5(yum): rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yid pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes sa/ 'og ming gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yid pade ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes sa
241b6(yum): shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha mig de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyis lha rnams kyi mi shes so// byang chub sems pa'i sems
241b7(yum): dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig gang yid pa de ni mtshe ma'i
241b8(yum): lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig ga ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems
242a1(yum): dpas chen po'i lha'i mig ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de gzhan 'phrul ba
242a2(yum): byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mig de ni tshangs ris kyis lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ byang chub sems dag
242a3(yum): sems dpa' chen po'i mig de ni tshangs lnga nye phan gyi rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po'i lha'i mig de'i tshangs bkur 'khor gyi
242a4(yum): lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems
242a5(yum): dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig ris 'i lha rnams kyi tha shes so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni snang gi la rnams kyis ma shes sa
242a6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' char po'i mig de chang med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis d+ha shes sa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chan ba'i lha'i mes /
242a7(yum): kur snang nga ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po'i lha'i mig de ni dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes sa/ byang chub sems
242a8(yum): dab sems dpa' chen ba'i lha'i rigang ni chung dge'i lha rnams kyis mi shes sa/ byang chub sa rnaMs dpa' sems pa' chen pa'i lha'i mig de chang meng dgepa
242b1(yum): mas myi gsas/ byang chub senas dpa' mams dpa' chen pa'i rtswa mas me ge rgyas kyis lhu mas kyi gas su/ chub snangs
242b2(yum): ba'i phyog da che ba'i lharnams kyis mi shes sa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba'i lha'i po'i de'i chung che'i lha rnams kyis mi sas/
242b3(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po'i lha'i mig de ni chang mang che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes sa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'char po'i lha'i mig 'dzu
242b4(yum): buche ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ byang chub sems
242b5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni shin tu ma
242b6(yum): ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ byang chub se
242b7(yum): dpa' sems dngapa 'chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
242b8(yum): po ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'a sems cad rnams kyis 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang /
243a1(yum): byang chub
243a2(yum): pa'i sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba'i tshe lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung kyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'tho ba dang rgyu
243a3(yum): ba rab tu shes so/ lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis
243a4(yum): sems cad rnams kyi 'che 'pho ba dngas pa rab tu shes sa/ lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byang thugs kyi 'jig cen
243a5(yum): gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig nga lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
243a6(yum): dpa' chen po ni byed shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'phob dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ lha'i mig
243a7(yum): des nga ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba ri shar sde'i phyogs marnams kyi 'jig tan gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems ca rnas

243b1(yum): dang 'char po ni nub byang gA thugs marnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cang 'ga' thung gi bye ma med kyi sems can rnams kyi 'che 'ab 'dang skye bar rab tu sems
243b2(yum): mig del bu ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa ni 'ogag phyogs kyi 'jig ter gyi khams kyang 'bru'i mang gi b+h+re ma snangasems
243b3(yum): 'di 'bab ngas pa rab tu shes so/ lha'i mi gang la bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba ni seng gi phyogs kyi 'jig carten gyi khams pa
243b4(yum): klung gi bye ma sed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'ab ba'i nga skye ba rab tu shes sa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshor ba'i lha'i man
